<li id="cite_note-recordonline.com-402"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-recordonline.com_402-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><a class="external text" href="http://www.recordonline.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20061024/BIZ/610240312/-1/NEWS03" rel="nofollow">George Washington Bridge turns 75 years old: Huge flag, cake part of celebration</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20180708134712/http://www.recordonline.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=%2F20061024%2FBIZ%2F610240312%2F-1%2FNEWS03" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）, <i><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Times Herald-Record" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="Times Herald-Record"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Times_Herald-Record&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Times Herald-Record（页面不存在）">Times Herald-Record</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Times_Herald-Record" title="en:Times Herald-Record"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Times Herald-Record</span></a></span>）</span></span></i>, October 24, 2006. "The party, however, will be small in comparison to the one that the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey organized for 5,000 people to open the bridge to traffic in 1931. And it won't even be on <i>what is now the world's busiest bridge</i> for fear of snarling traffic."</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-403"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-403">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20060902162226/http://hofprints.hofstra.edu/2/02/The_Myths_and_Metaphors_of_Music_and_Dance_Singin%27_in_the_Rain.html" rel="nofollow">THE MYTHS AND METAPHORS OF MUSIC AND DANCE SINGIN' IN THE RAIN</a>. </li>
<li id="cite_note-404"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-404">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><cite class="citation web">Richard Nordquist. <a class="external text" href="http://grammar.about.com/od/mo/g/metonymy.htm" rel="nofollow">Grammar &amp; Composition metonymy</a>. </li>

<p><a class="external text" href="https://findtechout.com/" rel="nofollow">重要技术</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210417170408/https://findtechout.com/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）
</p>
<h2><span id=".E5.A4.96.E9.83.A8.E9.93.BE.E6.8E.A5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="外部链接">外部链接</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%BA%BD%E7%BA%A6&amp;action=edit&amp;section=38" title="编辑章节：外部链接">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<table class="mbox-small plainlinks sistersitebox" style="border:1px solid #aaa;background-color:#f9f9f9;font-size:small;">
<tbody><tr>
<td class="mbox-image"><img alt="" class="noviewer" data-file-height="1376" data-file-width="1024" decoding="async" height="40" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/30px-Commons-logo.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/45px-Commons-logo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/59px-Commons-logo.svg.png 2x" width="30"/></td>
<td class="mbox-text plainlist"><a href="/wiki/%E7%BB%B4%E5%9F%BA%E5%85%B1%E4%BA%AB%E8%B5%84%E6%BA%90" title="维基共享资源">维基共享资源</a>中相关的多媒体资源：<b><a class="external text" href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/New_York_City?uselang=zh">纽约</a></b>（<a class="external text" href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:New_York_City?uselang=zh">分类</a>）</td></tr></tbody></table>
<ul><li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;">（英语、孟加拉语、中文、海地克里奥尔语、波兰语、西班牙语、俄语、法语、韩语和乌尔都语）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.nyc.gov/" rel="nofollow">纽约市政府官方网站</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20110224185624/http://www.nyc.gov/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.nycgo.com/" rel="nofollow">纽约市官方旅游资讯网</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20170922190501/http://www.nycgo.com/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>） （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20170922190501/http://www.nycgo.com/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li></ul>

<li><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="History of New York City (1855–1897)" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="纽约市历史 (1855年－1897年)"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B4%90%E7%B4%84%E5%B8%82%E6%AD%B7%E5%8F%B2_(1855%E5%B9%B4%EF%BC%8D1897%E5%B9%B4)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="纽约市历史 (1855年－1897年)（页面不存在）">1855年至1897年</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/History_of_New_York_City_(1855%E2%80%931897)" title="en:History of New York City (1855–1897)"><span dir="auto" lang="en">History of New York City (1855–1897)</span></a></span>）</span></span>
<ul><li><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="New York City in the American Civil War" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="美国内战时期的纽约市"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%BE%8E%E5%9C%8B%E5%85%A7%E6%88%B0%E6%99%82%E6%9C%9F%E7%9A%84%E7%B4%90%E7%B4%84%E5%B8%82&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="美国内战时期的纽约市（页面不存在）">内战时期</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York_City_in_the_American_Civil_War" title="en:New York City in the American Civil War"><span dir="auto" lang="en">New York City in the American Civil War</span></a></span>）</span></span></li></ul></li>

<li><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="East Bronx" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="东布朗克斯"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E6%9D%B1%E5%B8%83%E6%9C%97%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="东布朗克斯（页面不存在）">1895年扩张</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/East_Bronx" title="en:East Bronx"><span dir="auto" lang="en">East Bronx</span></a></span>）</span></span></li>
<li><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="City of Greater New York" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="大纽约市"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%A4%A7%E7%B4%90%E7%B4%84%E5%B8%82&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="大纽约市（页面不存在）">1898年扩张</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/City_of_Greater_New_York" title="en:City of Greater New York"><span dir="auto" lang="en">City of Greater New York</span></a></span>）</span></span></li>
<li><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="History of New York City (1898–1945)" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="纽约市历史 (1898年－1945年)"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E7%B4%90%E7%B4%84%E5%B8%82%E6%AD%B7%E5%8F%B2_(1898%E5%B9%B4%EF%BC%8D1945%E5%B9%B4)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="纽约市历史 (1898年－1945年)（页面不存在）">1898年至1945年</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/History_of_New_York_City_(1898%E2%80%931945)" title="en:History of New York City (1898–1945)"><span dir="auto" lang="en">History of New York City (1898–1945)</span></a></span>）</span></span></li>

scope="row" style="text-align:left;">第一次大陆会议<span style="font-weight:normal;">（1774年）</span></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;width:100%;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em"><a href="/wiki/%E8%B2%BB%E5%9F%8E" title="费城">费城</a></div></td></tr><tr style="height:2px"><td colspan="3"></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="text-align:left;">第二次大陆会议<span style="font-weight:normal;">（1775年–1781年）</span></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;width:100%;"><div <a href="/wiki/%E5%85%B0%E5%BC%80%E6%96%AF%E7%89%B9_(%E5%AE%BE%E5%A4%95%E6%B3%95%E5%B0%BC%E4%BA%9A%E5%B7%9E)" title="兰开斯特 (宾夕法尼亚州)">兰开斯特</a> <big>→</big> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BA%A6%E5%85%8B_(%E5%AE%BE%E5%A4%95%E6%B3%95%E5%B0%BC%E4%BA%9A%E5%B7%9E)" title="约克 (宾夕法尼亚州)">约克</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/%E8%B2%BB%E5%9F%8E" title="费城">费城</a></div></td></tr><tr title="费城">费城</a> <big>→</big> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%99%AE%E6%9E%97%E6%96%AF%E9%A1%BF_(%E6%96%B0%E6%B3%BD%E8%A5%BF%E5%B7%9E)" title="普林斯顿 (新泽西州)">普林斯顿</a> <big>→</big> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%AE%89%E9%82%A3%E6%B3%A2%E5%88%A9%E6%96%AF" title="安那波利斯">安那波利斯</a> <big>→</big> <a href="/wiki/%E7%89%B9%E4%BC%A6%E9%A1%BF_(%E6%96%B0%E6%B3%BD%E8%A5%BF%E5%B7%9E)" title="特伦顿 (新泽西州)">特伦顿</a> <big>→</big> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">纽约</a></div></td></tr><tr style="height:2px"><td colspan="3"></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="text-align:left;"><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E8%81%94%E9%82%A6%E6%94%BF%E5%BA%9C" title="美国联邦政府">美国联邦政府</a><span style="font-weight:normal;">（1789年至今）</span></th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;width:100%;"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em"><a class="mw-selflink
